channel.title: Docs on RSE Midlands
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on RSE Midlands

item.title: About
item.description:
We are a group who work in with and develop research software and are in the Midlands area of England.

We are members of the Society of Research Software Engineering. You may ask ‘What is a Research Software Engineer?’. You can find out more about the sorts of roles here.
